column25:
• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • Running shoes from Erke that are comfortable and stylish. The sleek design doesn't compromise on your fashion quotient while the clever craftsmanship ensures that you get the perfect support and comfort during your running sessions.

  • Product Details

  • White running shoes with a round toe
column26:
mesh upper and blue accents
Synthetic white overlay detailing throughout
Branding on one side of the shoes at midfoot region
Central lace up closure
Soft padded tongue with a mesh upper
Reinforced at the heel collar and branding at the back
Soft padded footbed with branding at the heel area
Tough outsole with deep triangular grooves and circular nubs
Comes with extra pair of laces
Warranty: 3 months from the date of purchase against manufacturing defects

  • Material & Care

  • Mesh
column28:
micro fibre
Wipe with a clean cloth when needd
